titles.title: A resolution to congratulate the Chicago Bulls on winning the 1993 National Basketball Association Championship.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7569-7570)

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 6/22/1993--Introduced. Congratulates the Chicago Bulls for winning the 1993 National Basketball Association championship.
